listing.listing_description:
Meet the Caribbean beach of your dreams at Villa Bari. One of three nearly identical luxury vacation rentals on Taylor Bay Beach, this beautiful one-bedroom home is only steps from the sugary white sand lined with palm trees and calm, turquoise waters that Turks and Caicos is known for. Book the villa by itself for an incredible honeymoon, or all three for an intimate destination wedding or family reunion.

Start the day by taking in the stunning ocean views over breakfast at the table on the villa’s private terrace, then stretch out on a lounger or have a swim in the pool. Take a snorkel and flippers out to the beach and explore the bay, or practice your serve on the shared tennis court. As the shadows get longer, heat up the barbecue and enjoy an al-fresco dinner.

This oceanfront villa’s cool, contemporary interiors echo the colors of the beach outside. In the open-plan great room, tile floors throughout the sitting area and fully equipped kitchen match the sand, while a turquoise sofa, blue glass pendant lights and vibrant artwork bring in the hues of the water. Relax in front of the TV or sip coffee at the breakfast bar for two.

Of course, it’s also tempting to linger in the bedroom at Villa Bari, with its king bed, en-suite bathroom and furnished balcony overlooking the ocean. Slide open the wide glass doors and fall asleep to the sound of the waves, or flip on the ceiling fan and drift off in its gentle breeze.

Most visitors choose Turks and Caicos for a holiday on some of the world’s top-ranked beaches, and Villa Bari puts you close to a quiet, pristine stretch of sand. If you can’t get enough of the picturesque bays, make the short drive from the villa to legendary Grace Bay Beach or Long Bay Beach. It’s also an easy trip to the nearest golf course, the gorgeous Princess Alexandra National Park, Turtle Cove Marina and downtown Providenciales.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With stunning views of the Turks and Caicos Banks, a unique modern layout and exotic accents, villa Balinese is an unforgettable retreat. Located on Ocean Drive on Providenciales and laid out around a private infinity pool, the spacious three-bedroom villa pairs striking interiors with a gorgeous oceanfront setting. Though the property has its own access to the water, there’s also a beach just minutes away.

The centerpiece of Balinese is an infinity pool and hot tub that looks out over the ocean. It’s bordered by a large terrace furnished with daybeds and crossed by an arched bridge. Follow a set of steps down to a gazebo and, further down, access to the ocean. Cooks will appreciate the propane barbecue and kitchen with Viking appliances, while everyone can enjoy the villa’s air conditioning.

Inside, the heart of the home is the great room, a stunning space with vaulted ceilings, pearl-stone tile walls, travertine marble floors and pocket doors that open to the pool terrace. Large, minimalist white sofas are a tempting spot to sit and enjoy the sea breezes, while patterned cushions and Asian antiques add exotic interest and a hidden television lends an element of surprise. The simple dining area features woven chairs around a sturdy wooden table for textural appeal, and the kitchen has dark, dramatic cabinets and countertops, plus a practical island.

Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, television, ocean view and a private terrace or balcony. The master bedroom has a king bed, private terrace, and pool access, while the other two bedrooms each have a queen bed and private balcony. For privacy, the master bedroom is located in one wing, while the other two bedrooms are in a separate wing on the opposite side of the house.

From the villa’s location on Ocean Drive, it’s just seconds to the water, a 2-minute drive to the beach and a 7-minute drive to the tennis court, golf course or grocery store. A 10-minute drive will bring you to restaurants and a hospital, and the international airport on Providenciales is only 12 minutes away by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located right on the beachfront in Fitt’s Village, this Caribbean luxury villa enjoys endless ocean views from its scenic terrace. With five ensuite bedrooms, all with king beds, Nirvana is perfect for a family vacation, a getaway with friends, or high-end corporate retreat. Nearby, you’ll have quick and easy access to Barbados best golf, natural wonders, shopping, nightlife, and more.

Nirvana’s sleek and stylish interiors are highlighted by warm natural colors and elegant chandeliers, creating an ideal atmosphere for any occasion. Both the living and dining rooms feature wide openings to the terrace and breathtaking ocean views. For an even better view, head upstairs to the rooftop wet bar, a setting that is sure to inspire fond memories. And, for casual dinner and drinks, the alfresco dining set and lounge on the terrace allow the endless ocean view and fresh breeze of the Caribbean to set a soothing tone.

Inside, you’ll appreciate Nirvana’s satellite and cable television, integrated sound system, Wi-Fi, and air conditioning. The fully equipped kitchen and barbeque are sure to inspire culinary creativity. Out on the terrace, the swimming pool, furnished lounge, sun chairs, and beachfront provide everything you need to fall in love with Barbados. And, the villa comes with housekeeping and chef service.

With your own beachfront just steps away, you’ll have no trouble enjoying the beautiful environment and turquoise waters of the Caribbean. If you’d like to explore more of Barbados beaches, you’ll find Paradise, Paynes Bay, and the legendary Sandy Lane, all within three kilometers of home. If you’re in the mood to shop, dine out, or enjoy some vibrant Caribbean nightlife, the downtown areas of nearby Holetown and Bridgetown are both easily accessible. And, for the golfers, the Royal Westmoreland course is the best on the island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Plan a special getaway for just the two of you at Villa Amalfi. Set on the white-sand shores and warm turquoise waters of Sapodilla Bay, the one-bedroom villa boasts picture-perfect views and direct beach access. Contemporary interiors clad in Carrara marble make a luxe yet minimalist frame for the postcard-worthy scenery.

Everything you need to enjoy the famed Turks and Caicos sun and sand is at your fingertips at Villa Amalfi, from chaise longues perfect for sunbathing to kayaks and paddleboards. Take a swim in the bay or your own pool, rinse off in the outdoor shower and enjoy local seafood from the barbecue at the beachfront dining area. In the evening, set the mood with the Bluetooth speaker, iPad and Wi-Fi and enjoy a nightcap at the lounge area on the terrace.

The villa’s sleek interiors let the beach views take center stage while creating a comfortable, luxe atmosphere. The great room, which opens to the terrace via wall-to-wall glass sliding doors, gets a bit of glamour from a marble-clad feature wall and floors. A soft gray sectional and cerulean ikat-print chairs are inviting spots to cozy up that nod to the hues of the water outside. The fully equipped kitchen has deep, dramatic mahogany cabinets and room for two at the breakfast bar.

The bedroom at Villa Amalfi occupies the second floor. It’s topped by a stunning Balinese-inspired peaked wood ceiling and opens to a balcony with a lounge area overlooking the water. There’s a king bed facing the water, a marble-clad shower open on one side and a stand-alone tub that encourages hours of soaking.

Though you could spend your whole stay in your paradise on Sapodilla Bay, it’s just 6 miles from Villa Amalfi to the dining and nightlife at Turtle Cove, 10.5 km to the courts at Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club and 15.3 km to the gorgeous sights of Princess Alexandra National Park. At the end of your trip, plan on a 7.5 km drive to Providenciales International Airport.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Gorgeous Villa Solemar is a wonderfully tranquil haven for relaxing and exploring Ambergris Cave, the largest island of Belize located northeast in the beautiful Caribbean Sea.

At Villa Solemar the morning greets you with a spectacular sunrise beyond the azure Caribbean Sea. Comfortable and elegantly casual for guests of all ages, the interior of Villa Solemar highlights the talent of local craftsmen and artists. The fully equipped gourmet kitchen contains all you need to create an extra special island meal or tropical drink to be enjoyed on the spacious poolside verandah. It’s the perfect setting to watch the sunrise over the reef as you enjoy your morning coffee or a place to linger in the evening for stargazing. Your verandah allows instant access to the beautiful pool accented with tropical planters.

When the sun goes down, browse through the DVD selection and relax in front of one of the flat-screen televisions, borrow a book from the shelf, or settle at the large dining table for a game of cards or some great dining and conversation. Whether your vacation includes quality time with family or a celebration with friends, Villa Solemar offers a memorable retreat where you can appreciate the magic of Belize.

The three bedrooms, each with a king size bed, celebrate the natural diversity of Belize with hand-carved headboards and artwork representing the island, the reef, and the rainforest. A full size futon and queen sofa bed provide additional sleeping options to accommodate parties of up to eight guests.

San Pedro Town is the only town on the island and is 3 miles away. It’s 1 mile to the tennis and basketball courts. From the beautiful azure waters of the Caribbean, to the Maya Mountains and the Pine Ridge, Belize has an adventure for everyone. Home to the second largest coral reef in the world, it’s a hub for snorkel or scuba diving. The reef lies one-half mile east of the Ambergris Caye shoreline and runs the entire 25-mile length of the island.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With direct access to Tamarindo Beach and Langosta Beach just a one minute walk from home, you won’t have any trouble finding, traveling to, and enjoying Costa Rica’s gorgeous beach environment. With a spacious interior and a private, sandy beach-pad backyard, Villa Morabeza is ideal for a special event like a wedding, family reunion, or retreat. The villa’s eight en-suite bedrooms can easily accommodate up to twenty guests. And, Morabeza’s ocean view is the perfect background for an unforgettable vacation. Bring a camera.

Morabeza’s open-air design invites the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely throughout all of its interior spaces, truly making the most of its beautiful climate. The living room is the perfect mixture of modern designer furniture and local beach flare. The kitchen is decked out in rich wood tones and high-end appliances. And, the dining area has an incredible wood table with seating for twenty.

Outside, you’ll be able to enjoy every bit of the patio without the threat of mosquitoes and other annoying insects thanks to the villa’s MistAway all-natural pest control system. And, that’s important because the patio has an alfresco dining area, pool, beach pad, workout/yoga area, and several lounge spaces. Morabeza also comes with daily housekeeping, laundry service, a caretaker, and daily breakfast. And, with a private pathway to the beach, having fun in the sun couldn’t be easier.

Tamarindo is vibrant beach town about five-minutes from Villa Morabeza’s private gated community. Sports fishing and surfing are both extremely popular with the locals, as are the beaches and beachfront bars and restaurants that line the coast. You’ll also find boutique shops and exciting nightlife in Tamarindo. If you’d like to learn a little about the local flora and fauna, head to Marino Las Baulas National Park for an authentic Costa Rican wildlife experience.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bright blue skies and lush green fairways are the backdrop to an elegant Caribbean holiday at Sienna. Set on the tenth hole of the Robert Trent Jones-designed Royal Westmoreland golf course, just minutes from the beach, this Barbados vacation rental is perfect for avid players and devoted sun-seekers alike. Invite up to six friends or family members to join you at this three-bedroom luxury property.

Tropical gardens surround the villa's outdoor living areas, which feature a private pool, barbecue, al-fresco dining for eight, and both shaded and sunny sitting areas. A wine fridge keeps refreshments at the perfect temperature, while Wi-Fi lets you easily share snaps of your stay. Guests are also welcome at the Royal Westmoreland resort clubhouse, gym, tennis court, beach and more.

Travertine marble floors and coral-stone walls are the polished backdrop to the home's refined rooms. Panoramic windows flood the open-concept living and dining areas with sunlight, and even the fully equipped kitchen is bright and breezy. A separate den is a more intimate place to escape with a book or watch a favorite movie.

Sienna has two bedrooms with their own balconies overlooking the golf course and the Caribbean Sea in the distance: a master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The third bedroom has a twin bed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and, for your comfort, air conditioning.

From the villa's golf-course setting, it's only a few minutes to the resort facilities on popular Mullins Beach, designer shops, polo and, of course, golf. A short drive will bring you to three other beaches, including picturesque Sandy Lane (the perfect setting for a honeymoon-style sunset stroll), and the shops and restaurants of downtown Bridgetown, the capital of Barbados.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
For incredible sun and surf, treat yourself to a stay at Villa Floramar. Set amidst lush landscaping on surfing mecca Playa Negra, the four-bedroom villa offers luxe beachfront accommodations for both surfers and guests who’d rather stay on the beach. Two other beaches and a golf course within a short drive mean you’re never far from your next adventure.

Slide open the wide glass doors from the great room to the covered terrace, which has spacious sitting and dining areas. A gazebo on one side is a quieter spot for reading or napping in the shade. Have a swim in the infinity pool just off the terrace, walk the 25 meters to Playa Negra, then rinse the sand off in the villa’s outdoor shower. For evening entertainment, the villa has cable television, and for convenience, there is a laundry room and a security system.

The open-plan interiors of Villa Floramar feel breezy and comfortable with touches of European elegance, like a subtly patterned tile floor. Two cream-colored sofas in the great room’s sitting area offer plenty of seating, while a driftwood coffee table makes a dramatic centerpiece. The adjacent dining area seats eight in casual wicker chairs under a unique sculpted chandelier, and the fully equipped kitchen has both practical touches, like a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances, and a pretty turquoise backsplash.

One of the bedrooms at Villa Floramar is on the ground floor and the other three are upstairs; all are air-conditioned. On the ground floor, one of the two master suites has a king bed, open-air en-suite bathroom, terrace access and ocean views. Upstairs, the second master suite has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet and ocean views. The other two bedrooms have king beds and one has its own en-suite bathroom as well.

Though Villa Floramar is located right on Playa Negra, it’s only 2 miles by car to Playa Blanca and just under 7 miles to Playa Avellana. Play a round at Hacienda Pinilla Golf Course, 7 miles away, and explore Santa Cruz, 22 miles away. Plan on a 50-mile drive from the villa to the Liberia airport or arrange an airport transfer at extra cost.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Soft sand, warm water and just enough room for the two of you—what could be more romantic than a getaway to Villa Capril? Tucked into a crescent of beach on Sapodilla Bay and beautifully appointed with Carrara marble, the one-bedroom villa is like your own resort. Thanks to a location just minutes from the airport, you’ll have your toes in the sand before you know it.

Villa Capril has everything you need to take full advantage of its spectacular location, from lounge chairs and paddleboards to kayaks. Spend the day sunbathing on the terrace next to your private pool, then cook up local seafood on the barbecue and watch the waves as you enjoy a meal at the al-fresco dining area. Set the mood with an iPad and Bluetooth speaker, and stay connected and comfortable with Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

Inside, the villa is simple yet luxurious, covered in a generous amount of soft white Carrara marble. Even one wall of the living room is enlivened by the texture of marble, with a turquoise ikat-print chair playing off the pattern of the stone. The fully equipped kitchen is all sleek stainless steel, espresso-toned cabinets and waterfall countertops, and a breakfast bar with just two stools makes each meal an intimate occasion.

The bedroom suite at Villa Capril occupies the entire second story, stretching out under a Balinese-style peaked wood ceiling. The king bed faces a pair of wall-to-wall sliding glass doors that open to a balcony overlooking the beach. Set on its own marble platform, a stand-alone bathtub invites you to stay and soak awhile.

From the villa’s beachfront setting on Sapodilla Bay, it’s 9.7 km to the dining and nightlife at Turtle Cove, 10.4 km to the courts at Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club and 15.3 km to the natural wonders of Princess Alexandra National Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 7.5 km trip to Providenciales International Airport.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This magnificent beachfront villa is situated in the St. James area of Barbados, along the island's west coast, a short drive from Bridgetown and Sandy Lane Golf Club. Nestled on a lush cliffside, the villa is perched directly above a serene tidal beach (ideal for swimming and snorkeling), and enjoys sweeping views of the turquoise bay. The stylish home balances natural seaside charm with sumptuously furnished interiors, featuring excellent amenities for dining and entertainment. Four superb bedrooms—including a stunning master suite—offer comfortable accommodations for families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eight in size. The villa's talented staff includes housekeeping and a cook for two meals per day.

Multiple outdoor living areas inspire dreamy hours under the Caribbean sky. Sip coffee in the morning light before descending to the beach for a swim or stroll. Fire up the barbeque on the main terrace in the afternoon, and gather for alfresco feasts in the sea-kissed breeze. Pour cocktails late in the day and marvel at the panoramic sunset vistas.

The interiors feature living and dining areas on both levels, with generous room for group gatherings or private moments. A fully equipped kitchen, secondary kitchen, and lovely bar with wine fridge create a comfortable venue for entertaining guests. French doors open from the elegant salon to the balcony, inhaling the breeze into the home. The villa is air-conditioned and features an office space for business travelers.

The master bedroom features rich hardwood floors, vaulted ceilings with exposed beams, a private balcony, and an extraordinary headboard styled from a reclaimed church door. The walk-in closet includes its own washer/dryer, while the deluxe bathroom has a jetted tub. There are two king guestrooms with ensuite bathrooms, and a kid-friendly room with two twin beds. Each room features a Smart TV and air conditioning.

The Reef features sparking space for six cars, and is located within minutes of fabulous nightlife, several famous beaches, and the two world-class golf courses at Sandy Lane. Bridgetown and Holetown are both about six kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Viatu is a spectacular luxury villa on Providenciales in Turks and Caicos. Situated on the leeward side of the island's northeast coast, the villa is just steps from Pelican Bay Beach and enjoys spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea. Outstanding outdoor amenities coupled with sumptuously appointed interiors give you the sensation of a private resort. The villa consists of two duplex homes, including two fully equipped kitchens and multiple dining areas. Six bedrooms housed within four distinct suites accommodate twelve guests. The suite structure makes Villa Viatu an ideal vacation rental for multiple families or couples, or for destination wedding guests.

The ample terrace provides a dreamy space for private relaxation or entertaining guests, with beautiful trees, gardens, and lawns lending an air of lush, beachside sanctuary. Enjoy enchanting days in the Caribbean sun, luxuriating in the hot tub, plunging into the scintillating pool, and sipping cool refreshments on stylish loungers. Prepare lunch in the outdoor kitchen, and savor an alfresco meal at the shaded, poolside table. In the evening, sip cocktails on elegant armchairs beneath the swaying palms. There is also an alfresco dining table and lounge on the second-floor balcony, from which you'll enjoy breathtaking ocean views.

Both the ground and upper levels of the villa feature open-concept living areas, each with a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable TV lounge, and a beautiful dining table. The ground-floor living area opens to the pool terrace, while the upper-level opens to the balcony, allowing the whole home to breathe the delicious ocean air.

The villa features four distinct suites; two are single-bedroom suites, while the other two have two bedrooms each. Each suite is a like a luxury apartment unto itself, with an ensuite bathroom for each bedroom, a lounge area, a dining area, and a kitchen or kitchenette, among other deluxe features. Three of the bedrooms have king beds, and three have queen beds.

You're a short walk to Pelican Bay Beach and an easy drive to Long Bay Beach and The Coral Garden. Equipped with the villa's six bicycles, you're just a short ride to Blue Haven Marina, Leeward Settlement Market, or Provo Golf Club. Princess Alexandra National Park is about eight kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa del Mar offers you unsurpassed luxury and comfort in the magical beachfront setting of Belizean Cove Estates. There’s no escaping the picture-perfect unobstructed view of Ambergris Caye and the sparkling Caribbean.

Exceptional Villa Del Mar commands an enviable upper floor view and features expansive vaulted ceilings in many of the rooms, adding to the airy and spacious feeling of this marvelous apartment. All around you are those wonderful views of the Caribbean Sea and Belize’s famous barrier reef, tantalizingly close. Copious windows and doors and outside spaces, including private balconies, terraces and verandahs mean you can easily let the outside in or step into the Belize climate and soak up those fabulous vistas. Luxuriously and comfortably equipped Villa Del Mar features custom designed furniture from Bali, antique carved wood panels, and the colorful artwork of prominent Belizean artists such as Walter Castillo. Your apartment truly reflects Belizean culture but still provides you all the luxuries and comforts of home. There’s a great deal to keep you entertained, including a gourmet kitchen, cable television, Internet, LCD television with movie collection and stereo system, all air-cooled by ceiling fans and air conditioning.

Set in the tropical oasis of Belizean Cove Estates there’s everything you need to maximize outdoor living. The Estate’s wonderful and impeccable pool area perfectly frames your view of the Caribbean. Here you can start your day with a dip in the pool, soak your cares away in the hot tub or wander down to the beach and take time out in a sea kayak, the perfect way to explore the Caye.

Your three restful and elegantly furnished bedrooms all include en-suite bathrooms.  For your utmost comfort all beds are topped with a pillow top mattress and fine luxurious bed linens and all rooms are furnished with television, air conditioning and ceiling fan. Your deluxe en-suite bathrooms also feature jetted tubs and opulent marble finishes.

Villa del Mar truly is an exceptional apartment in an ideal location to enjoy the largest of Belize’s islands. San Pedro Town is just 3 miles away and just one mile to the tennis and basketball courts. The famous coral reef, the second largest in the world, runs the entire length of this magical island.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

This Grand Cayman villa looks onto the brilliant blue water of a peaceful Cayman cove. With a brilliant white exterior and welcoming sun terrace, a sense of maritime serenity runs through this modern property. Relax into a poolside sun chair as yachts glide slowly by, making your plans for a sunny beach day, diving trip to a remote and enchanting coral reef, or a visit to charming George Town.

The blue and white terrace of this villa mirrors the colors of the Caribbean sky above, resulting in a relaxing mirror image that helps to lull guests into a tranquil state. The upper level of the villa provides a perfect view of the still waters of the cove beyond, while the airy and shaded interior provides a refreshing contrast with the sun-drenched island outside. The light color scheme of the villa’s rooms are broken by arresting splashes of colorful decor, while the welcoming sofas and easy chairs are ideal for guests looking to settle in for a comfortable afternoon. With a fully outfitted kitchen, groups will have all the facilities they need to cater for a delightful stay at this enchanting location.

Located on Rum Point, along a quiet stretch of the north coast of Grand Cayman, this villa offers an excellent combination of peace and quiet, plus easy access to the entirety of the island. From the nearby harbour, step on board a chartered yacht for a refreshing cruise along the coast with the Carribbean breeze propelling you on your way. Make an outing to a pleasant beach bar for a refreshing afternoon cocktail, or visit the nearby botanical gardens for a fascinating insight into the island’s local ecology. A visit to one of the island’s many gorgeous beaches is always an option, while the bright lights, renowned grill bars and pleasant restaurants of George Town are just a short drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Let your body and spirit blossom at Villa La Semilla. This incredible Riviera Maya vacation rental, whose name translates to “the seed,” is designed to both nurture and pamper, with lush jungle surroundings, a private stretch of beach, and an attentive staff. Bring up to ten family and friends for a relaxing, rejuvenating holiday at this luxury property.

Villa La Semilla is staffed by a cook who prepares three meals each day, a concierge who can help arrange activities, a housekeeper and a gardener. A palm-lined courtyard welcomes guests, and the villa opens to a tranquil oceanfront garden with an infinity pool, lounging and dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and wood-fired oven. Two rooftop terraces, one of which has a pool, let you soak in the sun by day and watch for shooting stars at night.

This one-of-a-kind home pairs contemporary architecture with rustic-chic interiors. Wood ceiling beams, slipcovered sofas and a weathered wood dining table give the open-plan great room a welcoming, farmhouse-inspired feel, while sliding glass doors and a stunning glass roof open the space to the outdoors. Though cook service is included in your stay, the villa also has a fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the five bedrooms at Villa La Semilla has an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony with ocean views and a tempting hammock. There are three bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom to rival any honeymoon suite, and two bedrooms with two double beds each. Whitewashed floors and ceilings and macrame-style throws lend the bedrooms a breezy, relaxed feel, while pieces like tufted sofas, carved headboards and crystal chandeliers add touches of unexpected glamour.

The villa’s location on quiet Soliman Bay gives guests postcard-worthy views and easy access to the beach. Take the provided kayaks out on the water, or pedal around the villa’s gated community on the bicycles. Be sure to visit the Tulum ruins, just a 15-minute drive away, book a tee time at the Riviera Maya Golf Course, and sample the famed nightlife in Playa del Carmen.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
C’est La Vie is its own little oasis on the Trouya Pointe peninsula, where privacy, peace and tranquility are only interrupted by bird songs and crashing of waves. Landscaped gardens completely surround the property highlighted by yellow, red, pink and gold flowers. The main house and its adjoining cottage and apartment are truly unique and reveal both traditional Caribbean as well as Balinese influences.The full-service villa team will make you feel like you are staying at your own private boutique hotel!

Start each day on the upper veranda where a lounge set and breakfast table give you a perfect vantage points for your eyes to wander from ornate curved eaves to carved hardwood railings to the endless green landscape. Saunter down to the swimming pool and dip your head under the waterfall. Dry off on a chaise longue before retiring to the nearby daybed. Refresh yourself under the outdoor shower then join your guests at the Banana Bar or fire up the barbecue.

There are several living rooms where you can all gather. Each one boasts soft sofas adorned with designer fabrics and surrounded by elegant antique wooden furniture, accessories and attractive louver windows. Enjoy meals in the dining area or one of several al fresco tables. A professional chef can also be retained to create gourmet feasts.

C’est La Vie contains five of St. Lucia’s most exquisitely designed bedrooms, each named after a local tree and clad with designer fabrics, soft linens and exotic, tasteful furnishings. Three bedrooms are in the main home, all with a private veranda, en-suite bathrooms, including walk-in shower and air conditioning. A fourth room is found in the separate cottage also with en-suite bathroom, private veranda and a study. The final room is in a comfortably furnished apartment at pool level. Its en-suite houses a handmade soak tub.

A short pathway leads from C'est la Vie to a tranquil, secluded cove from which snorkelers may search for reef fish or lobster and strong swimmers may circumnavigate the peninsula and find themselves in another quiet cove with a beautiful sandy beach. It can also be reached on foot in about five minutes; either cove is ideal for a picnic or a barbecue.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get a glimpse of the vintage charm of Puerto Vallarta at Casa Cosmos. Designed by famed Mexican architect Alfredo Terrazas in the 1960s for his own use, this luxury Conchas Chinas vacation rental was one of the first villas in the area and today stands above one of its only remaining private beaches. A full staff and seven suite-style bedrooms make this a wonderful alternative to a resort for a family holiday or a romantic retreat for a honeymoon-worthy getaway.

The heart of Casa Cosmos is its oceanfront terrace, crafted in natural stone and lined with lounge chairs, a sun bed and hammocks. Have a swim in the infinity pool, which is connected to the jetted tub by a rock slide, or take the steps down to the beach to explore in the kayaks. Rinse off in the outdoor shower and finish the day by sitting down to the al-fresco dining area for one of the two daily meals prepared by the villa’s cook. In addition to the meals, your stay at the property includes the services of a housekeeper, houseman and house manager.

Known for designing a showstopping villa in Cuernavaca for the heiress Barbara Hutton and the former Camino Real Hotel in Puerto Vallarta, Terrazas took inspiration from traditional Mexican architecture to give Casa Cosmos a classic, charming look. The main living areas are under a thatched-roof palapa, allowing the ocean breezes to pass through, and feature stone walls with built-in planters, woven sofas and chairs, and plenty of potted palms. Even the fully equipped kitchen opens to a convenient breakfast bar.

The main house at Casa Cosmos has four bedrooms with king beds, day beds, and pool access, and one bedroom with a king bed and private balcony; all have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. In-laws or couples can stay in the casita, which has a king bed, queen bed on the mezzanine, and its own jetted tub, kitchenette and living spaces, and kids will love sleeping in the “dormitorio,” which has two bunk beds and an en-suite bathroom.

Though the villa boasts a superb setting right on the Pacific Ocean, it’s also close to popular sights if you’d like to see more of the area. Playa Palmares and Playa Los Muertos are less than a 10-minute drive from the property, and the iconic Malecon esplanade is 11 minutes away by car. For dining, shopping and nightlife, make the 25-minute drive into central Puerto Vallarta.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Its name meaning "take your time" in local patois, this superb villa invites you to disconnect and savor the enchanting beauty of Jamaica's north coast. The five-bedroom home is nestled amid lush gardens on a hilltop within the exclusive Rose Hall Estate, offering serene seclusion just steps from Cinnamon Hill Golf Course and a few minutes from the estate's beach club. Fabulous amenities for dining and entertainment include a pool terrace with bar and an ample veranda with alfresco dining. The private staff enhances every aspect of your stay with their warmth, expertise, and gourmet talents.

Verdant gardens create an ambiance of tropical oasis under the open sky, while the villa's upper balconies gaze out on sweeping ocean views. A walkway leads through the forest to a charming gazebo perched above placid waters. Refresh you body in the hot tub and pool, and relish a delicious breakfast with Jamaican coffee on the patio in the morning light. Bathe in the afternoon sun on stylish lounge chairs, sipping hand-made drinks from the bar.

The villa's main living area comprises an ample veranda and open-concept interior joined by broad pocket doors. Two alfresco lounges accompany a dining table made of a lovely glass pane perched atop an authentic tree trunk. The central living room leads to an interior dining room with French doors opening out to the garden and fountain. Upstairs, an additional salon opens to a furnished balcony—a fine setting for games or casual meals.

All five bedrooms at Tek Time feature ensuite bathrooms, Televisions, and access to either a private balcony or terrace. Both of the master suites include king beds and deluxe bathrooms with dual vanities. The media room includes an additional sofa bed and ensuite bathroom. Air conditioning and ceiling fans complement the garden-scented breezes that circulate throughout the home.

Tek Time is within walking distance of Cinnamon Hill Golf Course and a short drive of Rose Hall Beach Club, as well as the beach and golf club at Half Moon Resort. Sugar Mill Falls Water Park is also within minutes. With Sangster International Airport just thirteen kilometers away, Tek Time is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Windsong is a spectacular beachfront villa in Cabarete-Sosua, a world-class resort development along the Dominican Republic's northern coast. With a private, secluded beach and spectacular indoor and outdoor spaces, this four-bedroom luxury vacation rental offers exquisite privacy in the midst of paradise.

Nestled in tropical gardens, Villa Windsong features a beautiful swimming pool and lush lawn leading directly onto the soft sands of Laguna Beach. Savor long days bathing in the ocean and playing your favorite water sports, then rinse off in the alfresco shower and sip fresh coconut water in the beachside gazebo. Returning from the beach, relax around the pool on loungers in the Caribbean sun or beneath talapia parasols, before withdrawing into a sumptuous lounge. Gather around the alfresco table for meals in the ocean breeze.

Large sliding doors lead you from the pool terrace to the capacious, open-plan interior, filling your mornings and evenings with fresh air and light. Under beautiful, vaulted ceilings with exposed wooden beams, you'll sip cocktails together in the lovely lounge before gathering around the dinner table for epic feasts. Beside you, the spacious and fully equipped kitchen includes everything you need for memorable meals, and opens directly to an outdoor herb garden and barbeque grill. There is also a second living area, with a large and comfy sectional facing flat screen television, along with a full work desk. The villa's furnishings and décor are absolutely exquisite throughout, with an elegant naturalism that roots you gracefully in the island's precious natural beauty.

The villa's four palatial bedrooms all feature king size beds, while three of the rooms additionally include two twin size beds, accommodating fourteen people in all—ideal for families and destination wedding guests. All of the rooms have balconies, ocean views, and gorgeous ensuite bathrooms, while three of the rooms have direct access to the terrace.

Beyond the sanctuary of your villa and private beach, you're very close to the wonderful features that make Cabarete-Sosua one of the top destination in the Caribbean Islands. Ranch Horse Beach Club is just a short walk away, or you can take a short drive to the towns of Cabarete and Sosua for restaurants, night life, or more time at the beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Incredible design meets gorgeous natural surroundings, including beach views, at Sunset House. Set in the beach town of Tamarindo, this stunning Costa Rica luxury home was designed by renowned San Diego architect Steve Adams, custom built by Flor de Pacifico/Jeff Hutton and decorated by Mu Design to blend traditional tropical style with contemporary chic. Five bedrooms and indoor-outdoor living spaces make this vacation house rental both practical and unforgettable for the whole family.

During your stay, you’ll be looked after by a housekeeper, caretaker and property manager, so you’ll only have to worry about whether to stay at the villa or walk to the beach. The expansive terrace off the main living area has sun loungers with views of the beach and estuary; head down the steps to another terrace with a pool. While away the afternoon in the hammock or the massage table, then cook dinner on the barbecue and watch the Guanacaste sunset as you eat. Thanks to all-natural insecticide throughout the outdoor spaces, you’ll be able to stay out comfortably.

The heart of Sunset House is an open-fronted, thatched-roof pavilion where the warm Pacific breezes wash over a generous built-in sectional, live-edge dining table that can seat ten, and a fully equipped kitchen with a filtered water system and a counter that opens to a bar on the terrace. Accents like woven dining chairs, mid-century-inspired lounge seats and squared-off sconces add modern edge to the natural look.

Each of the five bedrooms at Sunset House has an en-suite bathroom. There are two master suites with king beds and ocean views, and two additional bedrooms with king beds, one of which has ocean views and an al-fresco shower and the other of which has a private terrace. The fifth bedroom, meant for kids, has two bunk beds and two roll-out beds in case extra accommodations are needed.

From the villa, it’s a quick 5-minute walk down to the sweep of Tamarindo Beach and a 10-minute walk to downtown Tamarindo, where you’ll find restaurants and shops. The closest airport to Sunset House is Tamarindo Airport, a 4-mile drive away.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pamper yourself with aquatic options at this stylish beachfront villa on Playa Paraiso in the heart of the Riviera Maya. Sit back in the hot tub while the kids splash around in the pool. When you’re ready, step off the deck to the white sands of the beach or retreat the shade beneath one of the mature palm trees. After the beach, set out on an adventure in an underwater cave at Cenote Azul.

 Relax inside amongst the air conditioning and modern designer furnishings. The state of the art kitchen is sure to inspire your creative side. Pick up some fresh fish from a local market to barbecue on the terrace for taco night. The doors in the formal dining area can quickly turn the space into a refreshing alfresco setting for 8. After dinner, mix up some cocktails to sip on the terrace lounge.

Turn up the sound system while you’re outside enjoying the ocean view, and let the night unfold, hopping in and out of the pool, walks along the shore, and late-night snacks on the barbecue. Rather a hangout inside? Throw the big game on the Smart TV or settle in for a family movie night. Villa Carrera comes with daily housekeeping to keep the space fresh, and there are 2 parking spaces within the gated-property.

After a late breakfast, grab your camera and make the trip to Tulum Ruins, the ancient remains of the Mayan civilization. On the way home, stop in Puerto Morelos Reef National Park to try scuba diving or charter a fishing trip in town. At night, the beachfront party scene in Cancun is perfect if you feel like sipping cocktails in the sand and dancing way after the sun has gone down.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub, Dual vanity, Walk-in closet, Television, Private balcony, Ocean view

listing.listing_description:
Indulge in a tropical holiday in this lavish home, set upon the edge of a ridge along the West Coast—it’s one of our top villas in Barbados. You’ll experience touches of luxury from the moment you step on the grounds. A playground for the rich and famous, Barbados is an ideal gateway for visitors pursuing the sun, fine dining and high-end shopping.

Sink into one of the cushioned lounge chairs under a sun umbrella on the back deck; you’ll find several facing the infinity-edge pool. From here, you can walk across a wooden bridge that sits over the pool and leads to a raised gazebo. This back terrace lights up at night, and along with a barbecue, it becomes a perfect spot for evening entertaining.

Inside the villa, you’ll find comfortable living spaces with plush furnishings and features like a flatscreen television—the living area also opens up to the terrace allowing tropical breezes to flow through the home. The large kitchen comes fully equipped with modern appliances, although you won’t have to worry about cooking, a chef service is included with your stay. Enjoy meals out on the raised dining area with seating for 10.

Alila’s four bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests, including children, and each bedroom features a private, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. The master suite encompasses the entire upper level and boasts a super king size bed and opulent bathroom along with an alfresco tub on a private patio. The remaining rooms include king, queen and twin beds.

You’ll be a quick a five-minute drive to the beach and facilities at Sandy Lane Hotel. Meanwhile, the variety of dining and shopping options in Holetown are just seven minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated within the Sian Ka'an Biosphere Preserve at Tulum, this extraordinary beachfront villa offers a unique and unforgettable experience of Mexico's Riviera Maya. The five-acre estate is poised between the Caribbean Sea and Caapchen Lagoon, with three hundred feet of frontage on both sides and breathtaking views in all directions. Designed by the renowned Mexican architectural group De Yturbe, the solar-powered home gracefully fuses interior and outdoor living, blending contemporary lines, fine natural materials, high-end amenities, and touches of fine artwork. Four superb bedrooms suites accommodate up to eight guests, ideal for families with children. Your villa experience includes a talented private staff, and the Full Board vacation rental package features an outstanding private cook among other deluxe services.

Expansive outdoor spaces invite you savor the pristine beauty of Sian Ka'an (an ancient Mayan name meaning "where the sky is born"). The rooftop gazes out across sublime vistas of the lagoon, jungle, and sea, with a double infinity pool and a canopied deck with lounge and dining table. On the main level of the home, beautiful wooden verandas hover amid the lush foliage and dreamy views. The pristine beach and vibrant sea are just steps away, where guests can snorkel, swim, or kayak across the turquoise expanse.

Broad vanishing walls join the verandas to the main interior living area, infusing the home with enchanting views and breezes. The open-concept space includes beautiful sitting and dining areas beside a fully equipped gourmet kitchen. The villa is child-friendly and includes baby equipment, Wi-Fi, iPod docking stations, and a home theater.

Each of the four bedrooms at Casa Ikal features an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, ceiling fans, and a TV. The master suite enjoys a deluxe ensuite bathroom with a carved stone tub beside a garden-view window. The two queen bedrooms enjoy private balconies, and the kid-friendly fourth bedroom has two twin-size beds.

Casa Ikal enjoys a prime location amid some of the greatest natural and cultural splendors of the Yucatan. Named a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1987, Bian Sa'an is world-renowned for its pristine forests and beaches, extraordinary biodiversity, and Mayan archeological sites. Eco-adventures and sporting activates abound, including fishing, kite boarding, diving, and golf.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular oceanfront villa in St. Martin is located within Terrasse de Cul de Sac, within minutes of Orient Beach, Anse Beach Club, and Hope Estate. Newly renovated, the villa features a private boat dock and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea and Pinel Island. Ample alfresco living and dining spaces along with exquisite interiors set the stage for an unforgettable island escape, while six deluxe bedrooms (all with ensuite bathrooms) comfortably accommodate families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.

Savor dreamy days in the Caribbean sun, floating in the infinite swimming pool, sipping cool cocktails on elegant loungers or sumptuous sunbeds, and beholding the sublime ocean views. Launch your boat or kayak onto the vast expansive of scintillating sea, and return to a delicious barbeque at the alfresco table. At sunset and at night, linger outdoors in the lanai's ample lounge, relishing the dreamy island breeze.

An open wall joins the lanai and the interior living areas, allowing you to savor the ocean's enchanting presence all evening long. Adjacent indoor and alfresco living areas form an expansive, seamless space for entertaining guests. The luminous gourmet kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, and one of its windows serves as the lanai's bar. Beside the kitchen, a lovely table is perfect for morning coffee or breakfast. The décor is exquisite in both the lanai and the interior, with gallery-worthy artwork and a bright yet cool palette that echoes the spirit of the sea.

The villa includes six extraordinary bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms and furnished terrace areas, providing wonderfully placid privates spaces for downtime and rest. Five of the suites feature king beds and one has two twin-size bunk beds. Four of the six bedrooms enjoy ocean views.

Mapai balances exquisite seaside privacy with easy access to nearby beaches, dining, and nightlife. The center of Cul de Sac is within walking distance, where you'll find dining options; there is also excellent dining and nightlife at nearby Orient Bay, Grade Case, and Hope Estate, with its renowned Bacchus restaurant. Anse Marcel Beach Club and Orient Beach area also just minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
